name: The Underground
description:
My entry: The Underground - for HawkZombie's 2019 Game Jam.

Fay is a struggling, game dev who, recently entered a Game Jam. Only, for her to realize; she doesn't have, a idea for a game.  Then her friend Sarah takes her to a place named: The Underground, in hopes she'll find some inspiration for her game. Little does she know she'll find more than inspiration there.

Note: This game has some plug-ins from Yanify and Yami in it.
